This document explains where to get help with the project.

## Getting Help

### ğŸ“– Documentation

- **[README](../README.md)** â€” Overview, features, and getting started guide
- **[Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md)** â€” How to contribute to the project
- **[Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)** â€” Community guidelines

### ğŸ› Found a Bug?

If you've found a bug, please [open a bug report](https://github.com/garybrowndev/PinballAccuracyMemoryTrainer/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml).

Before opening an issue:
1. Check the [existing issues](https://github.com/garybrowndev/PinballAccuracyMemoryTrainer/issues) to see if it's already reported
2. Include steps to reproduce the bug
3. Include your browser and OS information

### ğŸ’¡ Have an Idea?

Feature requests are welcome! Please [open a feature request](https://github.com/garybrowndev/PinballAccuracyMemoryTrainer/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml) and describe:
- What problem you're trying to solve
- Your proposed solution
- Any alternatives you've considered

### â“ Questions

For general questions about the project:
- [Open a question](https://github.com/garybrowndev/PinballAccuracyMemoryTrainer/issues/new?template=question.yml) using the question template
- Check existing [discussions and issues](https://github.com/garybrowndev/PinballAccuracyMemoryTrainer/issues?q=is%3Aissue) for similar questions

### ğŸ”’ Security Issues

**Please do not open public issues for security vulnerabilities.**

Instead, use [GitHub Security Advisories](https://github.com/garybrowndev/PinballAccuracyMemoryTrainer/security/advisories/new) to report security issues privately. See our [Security Policy](SECURITY.md) for more details.

## Response Times

This is a community-driven open source project maintained in spare time. While we try to respond promptly:

- **Bug reports**: Usually reviewed within a few days
- **Feature requests**: Reviewed periodically
- **Questions**: Answered as time permits

Thank you for your patience and understanding! ğŸ™

## Connect

If you'd like to discuss pinball strategy, techniques, or have feedback about the app, feel free to connect through GitHub.
